channel.title: Making the Godsword Specs shorter [317]
channel.description:
For some reason when I perform a godsword special attack, the spec stays there for about 3-4 seconds, so you can walk around with the specaround your body, how could I make the spec go away faster?
thanks.

item.title: Making the Godsword Specs shorter [317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Check the attack special? I’ve searched “gfx” throughout my entire client and couldn’t find anything about godswords…

Read full topic
